About me

I studied Java web developer program through Generation USA. During this program, I acquired a JavaScript Certification and gained the technical skills using modern HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, and Spring Boot as well as behavioral skills and mindsets. I am committed to ensuring quality standards for optimal achievement. I am dedicated, proactive, goal-oriented, enthusiastic, and responsible.

I have a strong communication, and multitasking skills, especially in customer service in a dynamic work environment. Although this is my first formal role in web development, links to my portfolio will show extensive experience through personal projects and a willingness to learn and grow.

Thank you for your consideration of my application. Please take a moment to review my attached resume for your reference. I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you regarding my application.
